text: "Save a Prayer" is the sixth single by English new wave band Duran Duran. It is from their second studio album Rio. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom and Ireland. A live version was released in 1984 from their live album Arena. It was covered in 2015 by Eagles of Death Metal. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Duran Duran songs
title: Save a Prayer
